Air: 6.5
Con: 200-10000

for ppm = a*ratio^b:

Gas    | a       | b
LPG    | 6.1067  | -0.4102
CH4    | 6.987   | -0.3777
H2     | 7.4265  | -0.2847
alcohol| 10.8274 | -0.2104
CO     | 8.2236  | -0.1492

for ppm = 10^[(log10(ratio)-b)/m]:

Gas    | m       | b
LPG    | -0.4102 | 0.7858
